Items.Name: New Cray Research Inc CRI leather briefcase
Items.Description: .titledata { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:17px; color:#ffffff; font-weight : bold; } .description { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; color:#ffffff; } .link { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:12px; underline; color:#00000; } HR { color: #ffffff; } _ _ New Cray Research Inc CRI leather briefcase _ _ _ Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version This never-been-used three compartment leather briefcase was given by Cray Research as an anniversary gift to mostly female employees during the '90's. I ordered it as my 10 year gift figuring my wife would use it. She never did. It remained in the closet for years, never having so much as a pencil put in it. It is made by the Hazel company and is 17"W X 12"H X 2" thick with a 2 3/4" X 3/4" Cray Research, Inc emblem attached to one face. Expands to about 3". The two outer compartments are open, and the inner is zippered. All three are satin lined. Inside the inner compartment are pockets for small flat objects, loops for two pens, and a private zippered pouch. The outer compartments hide two handles which extend 3 1/2" beyond the 12" height. There's also a 40" strap with leather shoulder pad that clips to either end of the case. A very nice gift indeed. Still has that new leather smell. Winning bidder pays $8.00 for shipping and careful handling. Thanks and happy holidays. Payment I accept the following forms of payment: PayPal, Money Order, Cashiers check. Items.Name: LATVIAN BALTIC AMBER NECKLACE WORK OF ART
Items.Description: LATVIAN BALTIC AMBER NECKLACE WORK OF ART LATVIAN BALTIC AMBER NECKLACE WORK OF ART This beautiful necklace is made by an artist from Liepaja. She has been working with amber for almost 20 years and has developed genius ability for combining amber colour and shape in a way that makes her works vivid and delightful. You often see her necklaces, rings, bracelets and earrings in exhibitions. The oval beads trod together make this necklace look vivid and elegant. It is made after the design of real Latvian vintage necklaces. In 30-40 years necklace colour will turn orange. Presently beads are mostly cloudy yellow colour and some beads have reddish-brown shading. An attractive one. Necklace is 24 inches long. Biggest oval amber bead in the middle is 1 1/4 x 3/4 inches. Necklace has metal screw clasp for durability and amber beads are trod on a linen string. Click here to view our gallery auctions Those beautiful and sometimes rare amber handmade articles we have carefully selected for e-bay auctions from our Latvian craftsmen. This warm "sun stone" can be found in Latvia on the coast of Baltic Sea. It is many million years old fossil from conifer trees. If you look at the stone, you can almost see amount of sunlight it has accumulated through those long years. It is rare, but possible, to find very well articulated insect fossils in amber - they look like they're just asleep. This stone change its color with age, from yellow/honey transparent to very old butterscotch. Since thousands of years back people have been wearing amber to protect them from illness and evil, bring luck and wealth - and it really does. Items.Name: Beautiful Black Evening Bag - Never Worn
Items.Description: Beautifully-Designed Black Evening Bag Never-Worn. Perfectly tailored, and measuring 9 inches by 5 1/2 inches, this bag is made of a heavy black silk taffeta. The "strap" is also silk taffeta, with a heavy whipped edge, to look rather like a braid, and with a maximum drop-length of 14 inches. Actually the strap measures longer than 28 inches, because it starts at one corner inside the bag and runs across the interior before continuing up over the shoulder and down to meet the handsome knotted fringe tassel, which is actually formed by the ends of the strap, and is attached inside. The strap length can be adjusted on the inside, so the bag can be carried as with a short strap; or the bag can be used as a pouch, with the strap tucked away inside. The bag is about 1/2 inch wide, but will expand nicely (actually to 4 inches, but you probably wouldn't want it to go out that far). The label is "Morris Muskowitch - Made in USA". Inside is a small zipper pocket, and an open "comb-pocket". I'm sorry the pictures are so dark; I tried to edit them lighter; the black is a very dense, dark black. Isn't it fun to carry something with truly fine detailing? Especially when it's so pretty to look at! If you're the winning bidder, I will email you right away, or you can email me by clicking "Ask seller a question".
